description.attr1: Installs a general purpose tractor beam, capable of pulling objects closer.
Tractor beams were primarily used to pull cargo pods. More recently, more powerful variants have become available and with the added power more uses have been found by creative captains.

This system has a size limitation, for example a corvette class ship cannot pull a frigate class ship. For other objects (for example debris and asteroids) the pull power will depend on the relative size difference between the puller and the object being pulled.
